sentences.sentence: The value of Britain increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease greatly by 2012; while America decrease between 2010 and 2012.
The value of 2010, 2011 and 2012 in America is greatly lower Britain.

sentences.sentence: The value of Britain increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease greatly by 2012; while America decrease between 2010 and 2012.
The value of 2010, 2011 and 2012 in America is greatly lower Britain.
